channel.title: Mushroom's tech blog
channel.description: Recent content on Mushroom's tech blog

item.title: About
item.description:
About me Author of Learn OS with me Built large scale distributed online services affects millions of users. Designed and implemented Matchmaking algorithms used by all EA titles. Designed and implemented distributed key/value databases using Raft Protocol. Implemented UNIX-like Operating System. Wrote Full Stack VOIP application
Projects Regular Expression Engine Define context free grammar. Implement a LR parser. Implement a pattern matching function, with a few lambda helpers. Write a C Preprocessor A simple version of C preprocessor that can replace macros.

item.title: Arts Week 5
item.description: Review: Hacker and Painters Chapter 15 Design and Research 作者几个鲜明的观点： 设计不需要崭新，但是需要好。研究不需要好，但是必须是崭新。然后真正最优秀的设计和研究其实最终的路还是会

item.title: Arts Week 4
item.description: Algorithm Largest Number At Least Twice of Others 解法粗暴：第一次循环找到最大 第二次循环找是否满足twice条件 Review: 阅读了refactoring Improving the Design of Existing Code第二章。 ref

item.title: Arts Week 3
item.description: Algorithm https://leetcode.com/problems/find-pivot-index/ 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 def pivotIndex(self, nums): total = sum(nums) leftsum = 0 for i, x in enumerate(nums): if leftsum == total - x - leftsum: return i leftsum += x return -1 python enumerate是一个强大的枚举function Review: 监控系统

item.title: Arts Week 2
item.description: Algorithm 编程珠玑第一章 disk sort 100000个不重复电话号码, 在有限的内存空间里, 要求排序。 {% highlight python %} #!/usr/bin/env python BISTSPERWORD = 32 SHIFT = 5 MASK = ord('\x1F') N = 10000 Setting all bits to 0 a = [0 for x in range(N)]

item.title: Arts Week 1
item.description: Review: how browsers work 普通的tokenizer, parser对HTML不管用，因为html容错率非常高 浏览器工作原理： 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 tokenizer -> parser -> 生成DOM Tree

item.title: ARTS的初衷
item.description: ARTS的初衷 Algorithm。主要是为了编程训练和学习。每周至少做一个 leetcode 的算法题（先从Easy开始，然后再Medium，最后才Hard）
